_sText:
ze_castle_escape originally started as a way for me to learn how to use hammer editor, its not good and its not pretty a lot of the things look pretty bad and it looks pretty bad in the editor (i did not know how to optimize my maps properly)

-- Story
A out of control AI has released a virus that turns people into crazy dangerous zombies.
You've arrived at a city where, after the mysterious virus has ravaged and annihilated all remnants of a functioning society, you are the only humans left. You've got intel that the old castle outside the city is the origin of this virus and you have to stop this mad AI from continuing its destruction of the world.

-- Info
It's a one stage map that contains:
- 1 Boss
- 1 Item
- Castle Crashers soundtrack
The map doesn't require the stripper to work, but without it, some triggers will say the wrong times and the boss won't be that big of a challenge which makes it quite boring.
